Primary Energy: Space 3 (force bolts that always hit) Supporting Energy: Space 2 (medium range) Range: Medium, 60 ft. Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 5 Energy for 3 bolts Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Create 3 glowing darts of force that automatically hit (no roll needed). Each dart deals [[/damage 4]] damage. Can target same creature or divide among multiple. Saving Throw: None (force effect, automatic hit) Damage Type: Force (bypasses all DR) DR Interaction: Force damage ignores DR completely Scaling: +1 Energy for +1 dart (max 8 darts at 10 Energy) Success Scaling: 0 = 1 dart only, 1 = 2 darts, 2 = 3 darts, 3 = 4 darts, 4 = 5 darts
